{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = 2big-quadra-usb-3.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = LaCie 2Big NAS |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/2big-nas/ |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = LaCie |model = 2Big |submodelappend = yes |submodel = NAS |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;Armada 300, (Feroceon core); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5<!-- TE --> |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;29F2G08ABAEA; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M8DN-DH; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1518; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:4B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.14;KW LSP 5.0.3;
|exp_if_types = SATA, eSATA, USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = eSATA, RTC, fan, metal case, power switch |addchip = PCI Express to SATA II Host Controller;JMicron;JMB360;;1;,,, I2C Serial Real Time Clock;Maxim Integrated;DS1337;;1;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;1;,,, High Performance CPLD;Altera;EPM3064A;;1;,,, CMOS 8K 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Holtek;HT24LC08;;1;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;2;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, 3A Source/Sink DDR terminator Regulator;Texas Instruments;TPS51100;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 07/18/2022 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2012 |estprice = 209 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00D5YFT9A |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2Big-NAS-V2R", "1108 150 Rev B2" and "LaCie Group" are silkscreened on the board.
===Specifications=== * Network Storage 2-bay :Processor: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (Armada 300) @2GHz :Memory: 256MB DDR3; Hard drives: 2x 3.5" (SATA) :Ports: 1x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB 2.0, 1x eSATA :LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E1318 (Alaska) GbE (10/100/1000)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/5838/lacies-2big-nas-review ''LaCie's 2big NAS Review'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.storagereview.com/review/lacie-2big-nas-6tb-review ''LaCie 2big NAS 6TB Review'' on '''StorageReview'''] *[http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=2big_nas ''LaCie 2big NAS'' on '''LaCie NAS Wiki''']
